articles.title: Hall of Fame broadcaster Vin Scully hospitalized after fall and is 'resting comfortably' - USA TODAY
articles.description: Hall of Fame broadcaster Vin Scully, 92, was hospitalized after falling in his home on Tuesday. He is "resting comfortably," the Dodgers tweeted.
articles.content:
Rookie Charlie Culberson set up Scully with a two-out homer in the bottom of the 10th inning that lifted the Dodgers to a 4-3 victory and clinched the NL West division title.
